name: Robot Says
description:
In Robot Says, players will have to engage in an endless run, avoiding obstacles and swapping their colors to match those of the obstacles in front of them. Communication is key.

Xbox Controllers required.

Developed for Global Game Jam 2018 - Theme: Transmission

Original Page: https://globalgamejam.org/2018/games/robot-says

Gamepads Required
